short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture full-screen or specific application's screen for video game sharing!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitGudDojo is a platform for experienced gamers to easily share their skills in competitive online multiplayer games, and a community for gamers to interact with each other on any tips and fun experience in multiplayer gaming.
